thread.title: Nicholas Hayes
thread.title_full: Right Channel Radios reviewed by Nicholas Hayes

author: Nicholas Hayes
title: Nicholas Hayes
text: This company has great communication I feel like they are truly passionate about cb equipment. Just about everything had another link to complete items or to things you didn't know about needing. I will upgrade my old radio shack trc503 eventually and I will definitely go thru these guys to get it.
